title: (x) Simon & Garfunkel "Bookends" album type - Venus {James Eden}
content:
Greetings! My first post ever...  
Anyone know the typeface used on the cover of the Simon & Garfunkel album Bookends?

 [‹ calligraphy-type script on condolences card](http://web.archive.org/web/20070811192421/http:/typophile.com/node/19430 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Marc Jacobs website type - Engravers Gothic {Nick ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070811192421/http:/typophile.com/node/15932 "Go to next forum topic")
author: bullmoose8

comments.content:
thanks Dennis.  
: )

i’m gonna say Akzidenz Grotesque…

[Venus?](http://web.archive.org/web/20070811192421/http:/www.linotype.com/9662/venusmager-font.html)  
It’s not right on. The G might mave been modified.

Akzidenz Grotesk

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20070811192421im_/http:/typophile.com/files/bookends2.jpg)
’

BFK seem major diff to Akzidenz to me.

i don’t know what it is, but it’s not Akzidenz Grotesk:
